diagrams.description: Business Administration is the systematic process of managing organizational resources to achieve strategic objectives efficiently. It encompasses planning what the organization will do, organizing how resources will be structured, leading teams to execute plans, and controlling outcomes to ensure goals are met. This cyclical management process creates value through optimal coordination of human, financial, and material resources.
